column4: Anyone knwo why a fresh upgrade of 11.10 -- after a reboot complains that dbus is broken and when X starts just turns my monitors black?
you using xinerama by any chance?
twinview
everything is broken
I had to bring up my ethernet by hand and run dhclient
i dunno wtf happend
try turning that off and see if it works.  doesn't get along with compiz
It was working before reboot....
I upgraded, reboot and used the system long enough to reboot again and all hell broke loose
might have had compositing turned off
try recovery mode and go back to single head
negative, i was running top watching my zfs perforamnce and compiz was at the top of the list
the upgrade went smooth
I'd love to know what happened
I had the same problem and it solved it for me.  worth trying anyway
programs can't talk to the dbus socket at the least
right right, the bigger problem is no network interfaces etc
I removed the twinview option from my X config -- still black screen
just reading above where you came in and I see some others were having DBUS issues.
http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=1859794
it looks like maybe a permission issue
I can't read the link easily, what's the just?
